title: Just getting out on your own and need a home with
posting_body: Enough room to support a growing collection of belongings?
A good mixture of personalities and lifestyles?
Helpful management and a dependable service staff?
Done moving around and looking for a home where...
40% of your neighbors have called Park Place Home for at least 3 years?
Multiple floor plans offer you the right amount of room for the things you really want?
Peace and quiet are common ways of life and relaxation is footsteps away?
Whether you are looking for your first apartment home or your last, we feel that Park Place Apartments is the perfect choice.
With 147 apartment homes spread out over three buildings, Park Place residents have breathtaking views of the Mt. Diablo Mountains, Downtown Walnut Creek and our beautifully landscaped courtyard.
Add to that our Hot Tub, and Swimming Pool and Park Place Apartments truly becomes a place fit for a year or lifetime of  enjoyment.
Top Floor, same building as laundry room
1 parking space in our underground parking garage
